text.en: If contact isn't available in dropdown, please fill out field below:
text.de: Ist der Kontakt nicht in der Auswahl verfügbar, bitte unten eintragen:

Visual inspection of optical sensors. Clean if necessary.
- see cleaning instructions in operation manual
- Laser scanner in the lower area left and right
- Laser scanner in upper area
- Distance sensor on back side
text.en:
Visual inspection of optical sensors. Clean if necessary.
- see cleaning instructions in operation manual
- Laser scanner in the lower area left and right
- Laser scanner in upper area
- Distance sensor on back side

text.de:
Visual check vehicle
- General condition of vehicle:
Check readability of warning labels,
Check on scratches, bumps etc. on the outside. Especially in the area where the battery is located.
- Condition of fork tips, especially ultrasound sensors
- Check condition of charging contacts
- Check condition of lifting equipment / scissors
text.en:
Visual check vehicle
- General condition of vehicle:
Check readability of warning labels,
Check on scratches, bumps etc. on the outside. Especially in the area where the battery is located.
- Condition of fork tips, especially ultrasound sensors
- Check condition of charging contacts
- Check condition of lifting equipment / scissors

text.de:
Visual check condition floor charging unit
(clean if necessary, check for signs of wear)
text.en:
Visual check condition floor charging unit
(clean if necessary, check for signs of wear)

text.de: Maintenance by AGILOX or system partner according to maintenance protocol
text.en: Maintenance by AGILOX or system partner according to maintenance protocol

text.de: Electrical inspection of floor charging device according to national regulations
text.en: Electrical inspection of floor charging device according to national regulations

text.de: Electrical inspection of mobile charging device according to national regulations
text.en: Electrical inspection of mobile charging device according to national regulations

text.de:
Periodic inspection according to national regulations (Work Equipment Directive) by another suitable qualified person and at least every 4 years by an accredited inspection body - according to the inspection protocol,
Record in inspection booklet
text.en:
Periodic inspection according to national regulations (Work Equipment Directive) by another suitable qualified person and at least every 4 years by an accredited inspection body - according to the inspection protocol,
Record in inspection booklet

headlineText.en: Send/sent report to customer as email
headlineText.de: Bericht als E-Mail an Kunden senden/gesendet

body.en:
This e-mail was generated automatically.
Please do not reply to this e-mail.

Dear Sir or Madam,

In the attachment you will find the completed protocol as PDF.

Best regards
body.de:
Diese E-Mail wurde automatisch generiert.
Bitte antworten Sie nicht auf diese E-Mail.

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,

im Anhang finden Sie das abgeschlossene Protokoll als PDF.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen
